description.value: You're able to better control your body's metabolism to preserve energy. After eating a proper meal, you can go without food and water for 1 week before taking damage from starvation and thirst. You aren't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued] during this week.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
